week.theme: FIFTH WIN! Payback Against Thunder - Keep the Momentum!

training.location: Mobilio West (Town Centre Park) - Grid D
training.focus: Build on great win, maintain defensive shape, continue clinical finishing
training.notes: Wednesday training this week - preparing for Saturday's HOME match vs Sheffield United

match.preparation_focus: HOME game vs Sheffield United! We beat them 4-2 back in November. Coming off a brilliant win against Thunder. Rafael H in great form with 3 assists. Let's keep the momentum going!

highlights: Minh-An D early goal (5') from Rafael H cross
Henry K excellent saves in 1st half
Minh-An D solid 2nd half GK - kept clean sheet
Great midfield - Niko, Rafael, Adam, Ethan, David
Ethan G brace from Rafael H assists

captains.duties: Lead warm-ups • Take set pieces • Guide positions • Motivate teammates
captains.training_update: Captains will be announced before the match

goalkeepers.duties: One GK in goal per 30-minute half • Non-GK plays field • Switch at half-time
goalkeepers.rotation_note: Continuing fair rotation across the squad

sideline_layout.keeper_spot: Near coach for quick switch at half

captains.match: Oct 25 vs AFC U11 B Div 3 (FIRST WIN!)
Nov 15 vs CMFSC Sheffield United (SECOND WIN!)

goalkeepers.match: Oct 25 vs AFC U11 B Div 3 (FIRST WIN!)
Nov 15 vs CMFSC Sheffield United (SECOND WIN!)
Dec 6 vs RMSC U11B10D3 Blue Lightning (FOURTH WIN!)

notes.arrival: Arrive by 9:30 AM (30 min early for warm-up)
notes.coach: BRILLIANT WIN! Payback against Thunder - 3-1 away victory! Minh-An scored early, then we dominated. Ethan G brace in the second half from Rafael H's brilliant assists. Great team performance all around. Now let's keep the momentum going against Sheffield United - a team we beat 4-2 earlier in the season!
notes.match_update: NEXT MATCH: Saturday Jan 24 at 10:00am vs Sheffield United at Town Centre Fridge South (HOME).
notes.this_week: Training Wednesday, Match Saturday (HOME). Let's make it SIX wins!
achievements: Sept 13 vs Millwall: Score First Goal and Team Work Goal
Sept 20 vs PCFC Wolf Pack: Excellent second half comeback
Sept 27 vs Swansea: Andy E first goal! Travis C 2 goals (beautiful free kick!)
Oct 4 vs Tones: Best defensive performance! Yejun K and David C standout games
Oct 18 vs Soccer Stars: Dominated possession 25 min (1st half) + 15 min (2nd half)
Oct 25: FIRST WIN! 4-2 victory with Adam K hat-trick & Ethan G goal
Nov 8: Andy E beautiful finish vs PCFC Thunder (Travis C assist)
Nov 15: SECOND WIN! 4-2 vs Sheffield United - Niko D penalty, Adam K brace, Travis C goal
Nov 22: THIRD WIN! 5-2 vs Middlesbrough - Travis C x2, Rafael H first goal, Ethan G, Andy E
Dec 6: FOURTH WIN! 6-2 vs Blue Lightning - Travis C hat-trick, Owen H first TWO goals!
Jan 10: Solid 2-2 draw vs Geary - Adam K brace, led twice
Jan 17: FIFTH WIN! 3-1 vs PCFC Thunder (AWAY) - Payback win! Minh-An D, Ethan G x2, Rafael H 3 assists
